text: Christine Susan Johnston (born 31 March 1975) is a British windsurfer. She competed in the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Sailors at the 2000 Summer Olympics – Mistral One Design Category:British female sailors (sport) Category:British windsurfers Category:Olympic sailors of Great Britain
title: Christine Johnston (sailor)
